StringTable.Label: XendarScout_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Scout

StringTable.Label: XendarScout_Dec
StringTable.String: Unarmed but quick, with excellent Sensor Range. It will lose every fight it gets into, so try not to get it into any.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarScout_Class_Name
StringTable.String: ProtoType Scout

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarScout_Dec
StringTable.String: With the help of a Promethion augmented Hyper Drive, this scout is faster than anything we have been able to build in the past.

StringTable.Label: XendarSniper_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Sniper

StringTable.Label: XendarSniper_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range and kitted out for beam combat. A nasty little slicer.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarSniper_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Prototype Assassin

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarSniper_Dec
StringTable.String: This deadly short range ship uses an Elerium powered Prototype Weapon, giving it the firepower of a much larger vessel.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarSniper_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Sniper

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarSniper_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range and kitted out for beam combat. A nasty little slicer.

StringTable.Label: XendarBomber_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Bomber

StringTable.Label: XendarBomber_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range and set up for missile combat. A mean little torpedo boat.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarBomber_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Prototype Bomber

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarBomber_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range but equipped with powerful Prototype antimatter missile.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarBomber_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Bomber

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarBomber_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range and set up for missile combat. A mean little torpedo boat.

StringTable.Label: XendarGuardian_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Guardian

StringTable.Label: XendarGuardian_Dec
StringTable.String: Short-range, optimized for kinetic combat. An ornery little stone thrower.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarGuardian_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Prototype Guardian

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarGuardian_Dec
StringTable.String: Short-range but equipped with a Prototype Durantium Driver.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarGuardian_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Guardian

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarGuardian_Dec
StringTable.String: Short-range, optimized for kinetic combat. An ornery little stone thrower.

StringTable.Label: XendarKnight_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Knight

StringTable.Label: XendarKnight_Dec
StringTable.String: Short-range but versatile. Equipped with Thulium Hull Reinforcement it can really take a beating.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarKnight_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Knight

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarKnight_Dec
StringTable.String: Short-range but versatile. Equipped with Thulium Hull Reinforcement it can really take a beating.

StringTable.Label: XendarAssaultFighter_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Assault Fighter

StringTable.Label: XendarAssaultFighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Fast and deadly. Designed to get to the enemy fast and take out high value targets.

StringTable.Label: XendarDroneInterceptor_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Interceptor

StringTable.Label: XendarDroneInterceptor_Dec
StringTable.String: Remotely piloted and designed for close-range combat. Seeks out and destroys enemy Support ships.

StringTable.Label: XendarGuardianFighter_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Guardian Drone

StringTable.Label: XendarGuardianFighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Tiny but tough, these drones will defend your Support Ships to the end.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarSurvey_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Prototype Survey

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: A small, light ship capable of surveying anomalies thanks to a Prototype Survey module.

StringTable.Label: XendarExplorer_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Explorer

StringTable.Label: XendarExplorer_Dec
StringTable.String: Unarmed but quick, dedicated to exploration and not much else. A runner, not a fighter.

StringTable.Label: XendarCutter_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Battle Axe

StringTable.Label: XendarCutter_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range ship set up for Beam Weapons and Shields. It's earned its name.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarCutter_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Axe-R

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarCutter_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range ship set up for Beam Weapons and Shields. It's earned its name.

StringTable.Label: XendarCutterL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Battle Axe

StringTable.Label: XendarCutterL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Rapid Beam Recharger, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarCutter_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Battle Axe

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarCutter_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range ship set up for Beam Weapons and Shields. It's earned its name.

StringTable.Label: XendarDefender_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Defender

StringTable.Label: XendarDefender_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range missile boat, set up with Point Defenses. Packs a punch.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarDefender_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Defender-R

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarDefender_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range missile boat, set up with Point Defenses. Packs a punch.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarDefender_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Defender

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarDefender_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range missile boat, set up with point defenses. Packs a punch.

StringTable.Label: XendarDefenderL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Defender

StringTable.Label: XendarDefenderL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Missile Weapon Assister, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: AIXendarDefenderL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Defender

StringTable.Label: AIXendarDefenderL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Missile Weapon Assister, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: XendarGunboat_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Gunboat

StringTable.Label: XendarGunboat_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range shootist, arrayed with Kinetic Weapons and armor. A mean, mean ship.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarGunboat_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Prototype Gunboat-R

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarGunboat_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range shootist, arrayed with Kinetic Weapons and armor. A mean, mean ship.

StringTable.Label: XendarGunboatL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Gunboat

StringTable.Label: XendarGunboatL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Rapid Reload system, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarGunboat_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Gunboat

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarGunboat_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range shootist, arrayed with Kinetic Weapons and armor. A mean, mean ship.

StringTable.Label: XendarFury_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Fury

StringTable.Label: XendarFury_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium range ship, capable of all forms of combat, though excelling at none. Still pretty tough though.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarFury_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Fury

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarFury_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium range ship, capable of all forms of combat, though excelling at none. Still pretty tough though.

StringTable.Label: XendarSurvey_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Survey

StringTable.Label: XendarSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: A long ranged vessel suited for mapping the stars and running away from things.

StringTable.Label: HeavyXendarSurvey_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Heavy Survey

StringTable.Label: HeavyXendarSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: A Better armed and armored survey ship, for when discovery gets dangerous.

StringTable.Label: XendarCorvette_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Corvette

StringTable.Label: XendarCorvette_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size beam-warfare ship. If you need a lot of things burnt very quickly, this is your ship.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarCorvette_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Corvette-R

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarCorvette_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size beam-warfare ship. If you need a lot of things burnt very quickly, this is your ship.

StringTable.Label: XendarCorvetteL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Corvette

StringTable.Label: XendarCorvetteL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Rapid Beam Recharger, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: XendarCorvetteP_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Corvette

StringTable.Label: XendarCorvetteP_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Energy Accelerator, That boost the range of all Beam Weapons on the ship substantially.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarCorvette_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Corvette

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarCorvette_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size beam-warfare ship. If you need a lot of things burnt very quickly, this is your ship.

StringTable.Label: XendarRanger_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Ranger

StringTable.Label: XendarRanger_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size missile-warfare ship. Can put a lot of missiles into space very quickly.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarRanger_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Ranger-R

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarRanger_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size missile-warfare ship. Can put a lot of missiles into space very quickly.

StringTable.Label: XendarRangerL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Ranger

StringTable.Label: XendarRangerL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Missile Weapon Assister, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: XendarRangerP_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Ranger

StringTable.Label: XendarRangerP_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Slingshot Booster, giving the ships Missile Weapons a substantial boost in range.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarRanger_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Ranger

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarRanger_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size missile-warfare ship. Can put a lot of missiles into space very quickly.

StringTable.Label: XendarFrigate_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Frigate

StringTable.Label: XendarFrigate_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size kinetic-warfare ship. The larger the slug-thrower, the larger the slugs.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarFrigate_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Frigate-R

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarFrigate_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size kinetic-warfare ship. The larger the slug-thrower, the larger the slugs.

StringTable.Label: XendarFrigateL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Frigate

StringTable.Label: XendarFrigateL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Rapid Reload system, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: XendarFrigateP_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Frigate

StringTable.Label: XendarFrigateP_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Kinetic Accelerator, That boost the range of all Kinetic Weapons on the ship substantially.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarFrigate_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Frigate

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarFrigate_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size kinetic-warfare ship. The larger the slug-thrower, the larger the slugs.

StringTable.Label: XendarPaladin_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Battle Hammer

StringTable.Label: XendarPaladin_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size combat ship of balanced capabilities. Could form the backbone of any fleet.

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarPaladin_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Battle Hammer

StringTable.Label: AIDefenseXendarPaladin_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size combat ship of balanced capabilities. Could form the backbone of any fleet.

StringTable.Label: XendarCruiser_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Cruiser

StringTable.Label: XendarCruiser_Dec
StringTable.String: Large beam-combat platform capable of filling space with deadly, glittering colors.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarCruiser_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Cruiser-R

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarCruiser_Dec
StringTable.String: Large beam-combat platform capable of filling space with deadly, glittering colors.

StringTable.Label: XendarCruiserL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Cruiser

StringTable.Label: XendarCruiserL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Rapid Beam Recharger, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: XendarCruiserP_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Cruiser

StringTable.Label: XendarCruiserP_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Energy Accelerator, That boost the range of all Beam Weapons on the ship substantially.

StringTable.Label: XendarCruiserD_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Cruiser

StringTable.Label: XendarCruiserD_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with energy disrupting components, allowing ship to more efficiently cut though Shield Defenses.

StringTable.Label: XendarDestroyer_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Destroyer

StringTable.Label: XendarDestroyer_Dec
StringTable.String: Large missile-combat platform capable of spewing forth clouds of deadly missiles.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarDestroyer_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Destroyer-R

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarDestroyer_Dec
StringTable.String: Large missile-combat platform capable of spewing forth clouds of deadly missiles.

StringTable.Label: XendarDestroyerL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Destroyer

StringTable.Label: XendarDestroyerL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Missile Weapon Assister, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: XendarDestroyerP_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Destroyer

StringTable.Label: XendarDestroyerP_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Slingshot Booster, giving the ships Missile Weapons a substantial boost in range.

StringTable.Label: XendarDestroyerD_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Destroyer

StringTable.Label: XendarDestroyerD_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with Cluster Warheads, that allow Missile weapons to take down Point Defense systems with 100% efficiency.

StringTable.Label: XendarBattleship_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Battleship

StringTable.Label: XendarBattleship_Dec
StringTable.String: Large kinetic-combat platform, capable of delivering massive amounts of kinetic energy to things it doesn't like.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarBattleship_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Battleship-R

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarBattleship_Dec
StringTable.String: Large kinetic-combat platform, capable of delivering massive amounts of kinetic energy to things it doesn't like.

StringTable.Label: XendarBattleshipL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Battleship

StringTable.Label: XendarBattleshipL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Rapid Reload system, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: XendarBattleshipP_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Battleship

StringTable.Label: XendarBattleshipP_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Kinetic Accelerator, That boost the range of all Kinetic Weapons on the ship substantially.

StringTable.Label: XendarBattleshipD_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Battleship

StringTable.Label: XendarBattleshipD_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with Armor Piercing Rounds, That down armor rating at 100% efficiency.

StringTable.Label: XendarOverlord_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Overlord

StringTable.Label: XendarOverlord_Dec
StringTable.String: Large combat vessel, versatile in nature. For the indecisive who still wants a nice big stick.

StringTable.Label: XendarCarrier_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Carrier

StringTable.Label: XendarCarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries fast and deadly assault fighters that seek to destroy high value enemy targets.

StringTable.Label: XendarAvatar_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Avatar

StringTable.Label: XendarAvatar_Dec
StringTable.String: Enormous vessel designed for beam combat. Doesn't play nice with others.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarAvatar_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Avatar-R

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarAvatar_Dec
StringTable.String: Enormous vessel designed for beam combat. Doesn't play nice with others.

StringTable.Label: XendarAvatarL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Avatar

StringTable.Label: XendarAvatarL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Rapid Beam Recharger, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: XendarAvatarP_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Avatar

StringTable.Label: XendarAvatarP_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Energy Accelerator, That boost the range of all Beam Weapons on the ship substantially.

StringTable.Label: XendarAvatarD_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Avatar

StringTable.Label: XendarAvatarD_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with energy disrupting components, allowing ship to more efficiently cut though Shield Defenses.

StringTable.Label: XendarFortress_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Fortress

StringTable.Label: XendarFortress_Dec
StringTable.String: Massive vessel designed for missile combat. So, so many missiles.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarFortress_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Fortress-R

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarFortress_Dec
StringTable.String: Massive vessel designed for missile combat. So, so many missiles.

StringTable.Label: XendarFortressL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Fortress

StringTable.Label: XendarFortressL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Missile Weapon Assister, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: XendarFortressP_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Fortress

StringTable.Label: XendarFortressP_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Slingshot Booster, giving the ships Missile Weapons a substantial boost in range.

StringTable.Label: XendarFortressD_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Fortress

StringTable.Label: XendarFortressD_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with Cluster Warheads, that allow Missile weapons to take down Point Defense systems with 100% efficiency.

StringTable.Label: XendarDreadnought_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Dreadnought

StringTable.Label: XendarDreadnought_Dec
StringTable.String: Gigantic vessel designed for kinetic warfare. Will lower property values anywhere it shows up.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarDreadnought_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Prototype

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeXendarDreadnought_Dec
StringTable.String: Gigantic vessel designed for kinetic warfare. Will lower property values anywhere it shows up.

StringTable.Label: XendarDreadnoughtL_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Dreadnought

StringTable.Label: XendarDreadnoughtL_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Rapid Reload system, for a faster rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: XendarDreadnoughtP_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Dreadnought

StringTable.Label: XendarDreadnoughtP_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Kinetic Accelerator, That boost the range of all Kinetic Weapons on the ship substantially.

StringTable.Label: XendarDreadnoughtD_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Dreadnought

StringTable.Label: XendarDreadnoughtD_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with Armor Piercing Rounds, That down armor rating at 100% efficiency.

StringTable.Label: XendarTitan_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Titan

StringTable.Label: XendarTitan_Dec
StringTable.String: Titanic vessel designed for all forms of warfare. Capable of killing you in many, many ways.

StringTable.Label: XendarAssaultCarrier_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Assault Carrier

StringTable.Label: XendarAssaultCarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries fast and deadly assault fighters that seek to destroy high value enemy targets.

StringTable.Label: XendarColony_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Colony Ship

StringTable.Label: XendarColony_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, equipped to colonize distant planets.

StringTable.Label: XendarConstructor_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Constructor

StringTable.Label: XendarConstructor_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship capable of building starbases.

StringTable.Label: XendarBasicConstructor_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Basic Constructor

StringTable.Label: XendarBasicConstructor_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship capable of building starbases.

StringTable.Label: XendarEarthUnitTransport_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Unit Transport

StringTable.Label: XendarEarthUnitTransport_Dec
StringTable.String: Unarmed transport used to ferry Important Citizens between worlds.

StringTable.Label: XendarTransport_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Transport

StringTable.Label: XendarTransport_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, packed with troops and vehicles, built to invade unfriendly planets.

StringTable.Label: XendarFreighter_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Freighter

StringTable.Label: XendarFreighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, Used to establish trade routes with distant worlds.

StringTable.Label: XendarDroneCarrier_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Carrier

StringTable.Label: XendarDroneCarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries fast and deadly Drone Interceptors that seek out and destroy enemy support craft.

StringTable.Label: XendarBeamSupport_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Support

StringTable.Label: XendarBeamSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: Provides fleet-wide Beam Weapons and Armor for the boost they need to win against all odds.

StringTable.Label: XendarMissileSupport_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Support

StringTable.Label: XendarMissileSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: Provides fleet-wide missle weapons and armor for the boost they need to win against all odds.

StringTable.Label: XendarKineticSupport_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Support

StringTable.Label: XendarKineticSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: Provides fleet-wide Kinetic Weapons and armor for the boost they need to win against all odds.

StringTable.Label: XendarTacticalSupport_Class_Name
StringTable.String: Tactical Support

StringTable.Label: XendarTacticalSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: Can give you help with everything from Targeting to Repair. Always worth having in any big fleet.
